actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Armed Services.

official_title: A bill to amend sections 701, 702, and 705 of title 37, United States Code, to authorize the Secretaries of the military departments to allow a retired member to make new voluntary allotments from his retired pay toward the support of his wife and/or children upon a court order to do so.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretaries of the military departments to allow a retired member to make new voluntary allotments from his retired pay towards the support of his wife and/or children upon a court order to do so. (Amends 37 U.S.C. 701, 702, and 705)

titles.title: A bill to amend sections 701, 702, and 705 of title 37, United States Code, to authorize the Secretaries of the military departments to allow a retired member to make new voluntary allotments from his retired pay toward the support of his wife and/or children upon a court order to do so.
